Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Reroute at Armitage/Central Park
ShortDescription: 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Pulaski, North Ave, Kimball and Armitage due to, street blockage near Armitage/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Armitage, Pulaski, North Ave, Kimball and Armitage due to, street blockage near Armitage/Central Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Blue Island
ShortDescription: WB 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Morgan, Taylor, Racine, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Blue Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Morgan, Taylor, Racine, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Blue Island.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Kedzie.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
